Hi,These survival rates are generalized for the population and may not necessarily have the same meaning for a particular individual. They just give a rough idea about the average survival. Survival is also dependent upon the extent of damage to the myocardium and the severity of the CHF. EF is one of the important baseline parameters to give an idea about the status of the CHF and thus is commonly used in deciding about the long term prognosis. I sincerely hope that helps. Take care.
